---
title: Lesser Occipital Nerve
---


- Forms from the ant division of 2nd and 3rd cervical nerves
- Ascends along post margin of SCM where it provides sensory fibers to area of the scalp lateral to greater occipital nv



# Clinical significance

- Occipital Neuralgia
- Cervicogenic headache



# Acute
Instruction in mobility exercise
c1/2 snag

# Subacute 
Cervical manips and mobs
c1/2 snag

# Chronic
c/s or CT manip or mobs w/ shoulder girdle/neck stretching, strengthening and endurance exercises
